plot: Motivated by a terrible personal tragedy, Dr. Daniel Bloom, armed with his powerful new invention, the Time Belt, sets about trying to make things right.
plot_en: Motivated by a terrible personal tragedy, Dr. Daniel Bloom, armed with his powerful new invention, the Time Belt, sets about trying to make things right.
plot_es: Motivated by a terrible personal tragedy, Dr. Daniel Bloom, armed with his powerful new invention, the Time Belt, sets about trying to make things right.
title: Time Belt
